original_text: And there came a traveller unto the rich man, and he spared to take of his own flock and of his own herd, to dress for the wayfaring man that was come unto him; but took the poor man's lamb, and dressed it for the man that was come to him.
korean_text: 어떤 행인이 그 부자에게 오매 부자가 자기에게 온 행인을 위하여 자기의 양과 소를 아껴 잡지 아니하고 가난한 사람의 양 새끼를 빼앗아다가 자기에게 온 사람을 위하여 잡았나이다 하니

sentences.original_text: And there came a traveller unto the rich man
and he spared to take of his own flock
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기 양떼에서 가져가는 것을 아까워하여

sentences.original_text: but took the poor man's lamb
and dressed it for the man
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것을 그 사람을 위해 요리했다
